__slideshow_module_info__: With image slideshow you get an easy to use slideshow, which allows the user to switch between the images you define, in a slideshow manner.
__slideshow_pageblocks_slideshow_automat: Automatic switch images until the user interact with the slideshow
__slideshow_pageblocks_slideshow_desc__: With image slideshow you get an easy to use slideshow, which allows the user to switch between the images you define, in a slideshow manner.
__slideshow_pageblocks_slideshow_showima: Show image title and image count
